Steps: Cook chicken, saute vegetables, add sauce, serve over rice.
Beat eggs, cook with veggies, add cheese, fold and serve.
Cook pasta, simmer sauce with onion/garlic, mix, and top with cheese.
Cook salmon, prepare quinoa, toss with veggies and olive oil, serve together.
Stir-fry tofu with veggies, add sauce, serve over rice.
Cook shrimp, assemble tacos with toppings, serve warm.
Layer yogurt, berries, granola, and honey in a cup.
Brown beef, add veggies and sauce, simmer until tender.
Assemble bread with turkey, veggies, and cheese.
